00052 Client::Client(const String &install_dir, const String &config_file,
00053                uint32_t default_timeout_ms)
00054   : m_timeout_ms(default_timeout_ms), m_install_dir(install_dir) {
00055   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00056 
00057   if (!properties)
00058     init_with_policy<DefaultCommPolicy>(0, 0);
00059 
00060   m_props = new Properties(config_file, file_desc());
00061   initialize();
00062 }

00065 Client::Client(const String &install_dir, uint32_t default_timeout_ms)
00066   : m_timeout_ms(default_timeout_ms), m_install_dir(install_dir) {
00067   ScopedRecLock lock(rec_mutex);
00068 
00069   if (!properties)
00070     init_with_policy<DefaultCommPolicy>(0, 0);
00071 
00072   if (m_install_dir.empty())
00073     m_install_dir = System::install_dir;
00074 
00075   m_props = properties;
00076   initialize();
00077 }

00081   m_master_client->create_table(name.c_str(), schema.c_str());

00084 
00085 void Client::alter_table(const String &name, const String &alter_schema_str) {
00086   // Construct a new schema which is a merge of the existing schema
00087   // and the desired alterations.
00088   SchemaPtr schema, alter_schema, final_schema;
00089   TableIdentifier table_id;
00090   Schema::AccessGroup *final_ag;
00091   Schema::ColumnFamily *final_cf;
00092   String final_schema_str;
00093   TablePtr table = open_table(name);
00094 
00095   schema = table->schema();
00096   alter_schema = Schema::new_instance(alter_schema_str.c_str(),
00097       alter_schema_str.length());
00098   if (!alter_schema->is_valid())
00099     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, alter_schema->get_error_string());
00100 
00101   final_schema = new Schema(*(schema.get()));
00102   final_schema->incr_generation();
00103 
00104   foreach(Schema::AccessGroup *alter_ag, alter_schema->get_access_groups()) {
00105     // create a new access group if needed
00106     if(!final_schema->access_group_exists(alter_ag->name)) {
00107       final_ag = new Schema::AccessGroup();
00108       final_ag->name = alter_ag->name;
00109       final_ag->in_memory = alter_ag->in_memory;
00110       final_ag->blocksize = alter_ag->blocksize;
00111       final_ag->compressor = alter_ag->compressor;
00112       final_ag->bloom_filter = alter_ag->bloom_filter;
00113       if (!final_schema->add_access_group(final_ag)) {
00114         String error_msg = final_schema->get_error_string();
00115         delete final_ag;
00116         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, error_msg);
00117       }
00118     }
00119     else {
00120       final_ag = final_schema->get_access_group(alter_ag->name);
00121     }
00122   }
00123 
00124   // go through each column family to be altered
00125   foreach(Schema::ColumnFamily *alter_cf,
00126         alter_schema->get_column_families()) {
00127     if (alter_cf->deleted) {
00128       if (!final_schema->drop_column_family(alter_cf->name))
00129         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, final_schema->get_error_string());
00130     }
00131     else {
00132       // add column family
00133       if(final_schema->get_max_column_family_id() >= Schema::ms_max_column_id)
00134         HT_THROW(Error::TOO_MANY_COLUMNS, (String)"Attempting to add > "
00135                  + Schema::ms_max_column_id
00136                  + (String) " column families to table");
00137       final_schema->incr_max_column_family_id();
00138       final_cf = new Schema::ColumnFamily(*alter_cf);
00139       final_cf->id = (uint32_t) final_schema->get_max_column_family_id();
00140       final_cf->generation = final_schema->get_generation();
00141 
00142       if(!final_schema->add_column_family(final_cf)) {
00143         String error_msg = final_schema->get_error_string();
00144         delete final_cf;
00145         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, error_msg);
00146       }
00147     }
00148   }
00149 
00150   final_schema->render(final_schema_str, true);
00151   try {
00152     m_master_client->alter_table(name.c_str(), final_schema_str.c_str());
00153   }
00154   catch (Exception &e) {
00155     // In case someone else has altered the table, refresh our
00156     // version of the schema and throw the error up
00157     if (e.code() == Error::MASTER_SCHEMA_GENERATION_MISMATCH) {
00158       refresh_table(name);
00159       HT_THROW(e.code(), e.what() +
00160           (String)" Table possibly altered by another client, try again");
00161     }
00162     HT_THROW(e.code(), e.what());
00163   }
00164 }

00167 Table *Client::open_table(const String &name, bool force) {
00168   {
00169     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00170     TableCache::iterator it = m_table_cache.find(name);
00171 
00172     if (it != m_table_cache.end()) {
00173       if (force || it->second->need_refresh())
00174         it->second->refresh();
00175 
00176       return it->second.get();
00177     }
00178   }
00179   Table *table = new Table(m_props, m_range_locator, m_conn_manager,
00180                            m_hyperspace, m_app_queue, name, m_timeout_ms);
00181   {
00182     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00183     m_table_cache.insert(make_pair(name, table));
00184   }
00185   return table;
00186 }
00187 
00188 
00189 void Client::refresh_table(const String &name) {
00190   open_table(name, true);
00191 }

00194 uint32_t Client::get_table_id(const String &name) {
00195   // TODO: issue 11
00196   String table_file("/hypertable/tables/"); table_file += name;
00197   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00198   Hyperspace::HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00199   uint64_t handle;
00200   uint32_t uval;
00201 
00202   handle = m_hyperspace->open(table_file, OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback);
00203 
00204   // Get the 'table_id' attribute. TODO use attr_get_i32
00205   m_hyperspace->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf);
00206 
00207   m_hyperspace->close(handle);
00208 
00209   uval = (uint32_t)atoi((const char *)value_buf.base);
00210 
00211   return uval;
00212 }

00215 String Client::get_schema(const String &name, bool with_ids) {
00216   String schema_str;
00217 
00218   m_master_client->get_schema(name.c_str(), schema_str);
00219 
00220   if (!with_ids) {
00221     Schema *schema = Schema::new_instance(schema_str.c_str(), schema_str.length(), true);
00222     if (!schema->is_valid())
00223       HT_ERRORF("Schema Parse Error: %s", schema->get_error_string());
00224     else {
00225       schema_str = "";
00226       schema->render(schema_str, false);
00227     }
00228     delete schema;
00229   }
00230 
00231   return schema_str;
00232 }

00234 
00235 void Client::get_tables(std::vector<String> &tables) {
00236   uint64_t handle;
00237   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00238   std::vector<Hyperspace::DirEntry> listing;
00239 
00240   handle = m_hyperspace->open("/hypertable/tables", OPEN_FLAG_READ,
00241                               null_handle_callback);
00242 
00243   m_hyperspace->readdir(handle, listing);
00244 
00245   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00246     if (!listing[i].is_dir)
00247       tables.push_back(listing[i].name);
00248   }
00249 
00250   m_hyperspace->close(handle);
00251 }

00253 
00254 void Client::drop_table(const String &name, bool if_exists) {
00255   {
00256     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00257 
00258     // remove it from cache
00259     TableCache::iterator it = m_table_cache.find(name);
00260 
00261     if (it != m_table_cache.end())
00262       m_table_cache.erase(it);
00263   }
00264   m_master_client->drop_table(name.c_str(), if_exists);
00265 }

00268 {
00269   return m_hyperspace;

00273   m_master_client->shutdown();

00284 void Client::initialize() {
00285   uint32_t wait_time, remaining;
00286 
00287   m_comm = Comm::instance();
00288   m_conn_manager = new ConnectionManager(m_comm);
00289 
00290   if (m_timeout_ms == 0)
00291     m_timeout_ms = m_props->get_i32("Hypertable.Request.Timeout");
00292 
00293   m_hyperspace = new Hyperspace::Session(m_comm, m_props);
00294 
00295   Timer timer(m_timeout_ms, true);
00296 
00297   remaining = timer.remaining();
00298   wait_time = (remaining < 3000) ? remaining : 3000;
00299 
00300   while (!m_hyperspace->wait_for_connection(wait_time)) {
00301 
00302     if (timer.expired())
00303       HT_THROW_(Error::CONNECT_ERROR_HYPERSPACE);
00304 
00305     cout << "Waiting for connection to Hyperspace..." << endl;
00306 
00307     remaining = timer.remaining();
00308     wait_time = (remaining < 3000) ? remaining : 3000;
00309   }
00310 
00311   m_app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(m_props->
00312                                      get_i32("Hypertable.Client.Workers"));
00313   m_master_client = new MasterClient(m_conn_manager, m_hyperspace, m_timeout_ms,
00314                                      m_app_queue);
00315 
00316   m_master_client->initiate_connection(0);
00317 
00318   m_range_locator = new RangeLocator(m_props, m_conn_manager, m_hyperspace,
00319                                      m_timeout_ms);
00320 }
